item.title: Quicker way of adding maps
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

It’s just like doing add model but for maps. Here y’all are. Make sure that you gzip the map files before adding them.

Add these in client class:

[CODE]/**************************************************************************************************/
/*

  • @Author cocoa
  • Compresses maps into the idx4 cache file.

*/
public void maps() {
for(int MapIndex = 0; MapIndex < 5000; MapIndex++) {
byte[] abyte0 = GetMap(MapIndex);
if(abyte0 != null && abyte0.length > 0) {
aClass14Array970[4].method234(abyte0.length, abyte0, (byte)2, MapIndex);
}
}
}

/*

  • @Author cocoa
  • Gets maps from set directory and
  • puts them into a readable form for
  • the client.
  • Index - File being read from set directory

*/
public byte[] GetMap(int Index) {
try {
File Map = new File(“C:/YOURCACHE/maps/”+Index+".gz");
byte[] aByte = new byte[(int)Map.length()];
FileInputStream Fis = new FileInputStream(Map);
Fis.read(aByte);
method77(“aByte = [”+aByte+"]!", 0, “”, aBoolean991);
Fis.close();
return aByte;
} catch(Exception e) {
return null;
}
}
/**************************************************************************************************/[/CODE]

Then find the commands in your client class and put this:

[CODE]/**************************************************************************************************/

		/*
		 * @Author cocoa
		 * Command that compresses all maps 
                     * in the maps folder into the idx4
		 * file in the cache
		 *
                     */
		if(aString887.equals("::compressmaps")) {
			maps();
		}

/**************************************************************************************************/[/CODE]

All 474 maps dumped into .dat form

http://uppit.com/6xr2omom17my/maps.rar

Gzipper

UppIT - Free File hosting - gzip.exe

Read full topic
